title: Exploring the Influence of Ethnic Culture in Practice-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Science education field experience and possession of basic laboratory skills
context.additional_context: A course for elementary school teachers exploring pedagogical methods incorporating ethnic-cultural elements in science experiment classes.

learning_goals: Learners can design science experiments reflecting ethnocultural contexts in VR simulation environments.
Learners can analyze the impact of cultural elements on science learning through collaboration with peer teachers.
Learners can develop culture-integrated educational scenarios applicable to their teaching via project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
